settings.name: Set default LED pin GPIO number(s) (one or more numbers separated by commas)
Set default button pin GPIO number:
Set default relay pin GPIO number:
Set default relay mode: 1=active high, 0=active low (default: 1)
Define max number of LED busses (defaults: 4 on ESP8266 and on ESP32C3, 20 on ESP32, 6 on ESP32S3, 7 on ESP32S2)
Define the name of the internal WiFI Access Point (default: WLED-AP)

usermods.name: Audio Reactive (for use with >=0.15.x WLED versions)

options.name: Battery check interval in ms, defaults to 30000 ms
Maximum battery voltage in Volts, default is 4.2 (18650 battery standard)
The capacity of all cells in parallel summed up in mAh
Offset / calibration number, fine tune the measured voltage by the microcontroller
Enables auto-off. Please enter true to enable, false to disable
When this threshold (in %, 0 to 100) is reached master power turns off
When low power is detected then use this preset ID to indicate low power
When this threshold (in %, 0 to 100) is reached low power gets indicated
For this duration (in seconds) the configured preset is played

envtextfield:
[env:custom_build]
extends = env:esp32c3dev
build_flags = ${env:esp32c3dev.build_flags} -D WLED_DISABLE_ALEXA -D WLED_DISABLE_HUESYNC -D DATA_PINS=8 -D BTNPIN=1 -D RLYPIN=4 -D RLYMDE=0 -D SR_DMTYPE=1 -D WLED_MAX_BUSSES=1 -D PIXEL_COUNTS=43 -D WLED_AP_SSID='"BadgESC{21}"' -D USERMOD_BATTERY_MEASUREMENT_PIN=3 -D USERMOD_BATTERY_MEASUREMENT_INTERVAL=5000 -D USERMOD_BATTERY_MAX_VOLTAGE=4.35f -D USERMOD_BATTERY_TOTAL_CAPACITY=500 -D USERMOD_BATTERY_CALIBRATION=0.025 -D USERMOD_BATTERY_AUTO_OFF_ENABLED=false -D USERMOD_BATTERY_AUTO_OFF_THRESHOLD=1 -D USERMOD_BATTERY_LOW_POWER_INDICATOR_ENABLED=true -D USERMOD_BATTERY_LOW_POWER_INDICATOR_PRESET=3 -D USERMOD_BATTERY_LOW_POWER_INDICATOR_THRESHOLD=20 -D USERMOD_BATTERY_LOW_POWER_INDICATOR_DURATION=30
custom_usermods =  audioreactive Battery Internal_Temperature
